name: Dairy Farm Shop Management System manage-companies.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Dairy Farm Shop Management System Dairy Farm Shop Management System 1.3"]
description: Dairy Farm Shop Management System是一套基于PHP和MySQL的奶牛场管理系统。Dairy Farm Shop Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于manage-companies.php缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
